name: Credits Estimator Using Data Volume - CSE Version
title: Credits Estimator Using Data Volume - CSE Version

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
//| concat(deployment,"_",org_id) as key
//| lookup org_id,org_name,daily_gb_limit from /shared/lookups/master_orgs on key=key  
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq
| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}})  /100),0) as continuous
| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes * ({{cse_pct}}  /100),0) as cse
| if (tier = "frequent",gbytes,0) as frequent
| if (tier = "infrequent",gbytes,0) as infrequent

| concat("continuous:",continuous,"cse:",cse,"frequent:",frequent,"infrequent:",infrequent) as transport
| parse regex field = transport "(?<type>[a-z_]+):(?<gbytes>[0-9]+)" multi

|  sum(gbytes) by type, _timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column type

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| where tier = "continuous"
| view as index
| if (index matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",index) as index
|  sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column index

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| where tier = "frequent"
| view as index
| if (index matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",index) as index
|  sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column index

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| where tier = "infrequent"
| view as index
| if (index matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",index) as index
|  sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column index

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes

| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cont * gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}})  /100),0) as cr_continuous
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cse * gbytes * ({{cse_pct}}  /100),0) as cr_cse
| if (tier = "frequent",cr_freq * gbytes,0) as cr_frequent
| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq * gbytes,0) as cr_infrequent

| concat("cr_continuous:",cr_continuous,"cr_cse:",cr_cse,"cr_frequent:",cr_frequent,"cr_infrequent:",cr_infrequent) as transport
| parse regex field = transport "(?<type>[a-z_]+):(?<credits>[0-9]+)" multi

|  sum(credits) by type, _timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column type

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier
| view as rename_for_report
| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as rename_for_report
| if (view matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",rename_for_report) as rename_for_report
| 20 as cr_cont
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cont * gbytes,0) as ingest_credits_consumed
| if (tier = "frequent",cr_freq * gbytes,ingest_credits_consumed) as ingest_credits_consumed
| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq * gbytes,ingest_credits_consumed) as ingest_credits_consumed
| gbytes as gbytes
| sort ingest_credits_consumed
| fields -cr_cont,cr_freq,cr_infreq
| ingest_credits_consumed / gbytes as CPGI

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes

| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cont * gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}})  /100),0) as cr_continuous
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cse * gbytes * ({{cse_pct}}  /100),0) as cr_cse
| if (tier = "frequent",cr_freq * gbytes,0) as cr_frequent
| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq * gbytes,0) as cr_infrequent

| concat("cr_continuous:",cr_continuous,"cr_cse:",cr_cse,"cr_frequent:",cr_frequent,"cr_infrequent:",cr_infrequent) as transport
| parse regex field = transport "(?<type>[a-z_]+):(?<credits>[0-9]+)" multi
| sum(credits) as credits by type

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard estimates INGEST , METRIC, STORAGE and INFREQUENT SCAN credits.

**Log Ingest Credits** estimates require that regular expressions **must match** your partition to the correct tier.

- Use params:```infreq_regex```  ```freq_regex``` ```cse_regex``` 
- cse_regex maps normalised cse_data partitions to exclude from ingest credits.

**cse_pct** we can only estimate cse vs continous credits. Use the panel: 'CIP vs CSE Credits Estimate' to estimate a correct percent value for cse logs: ```_siemforward=true```

**Infrequent Scan Credits**:
For infrequent scans data uses search audit infrequent search events. For more detailed infrequent scan dashboards see the [Infrequent App](https://help.sumologic.com/07Sumo-Logic-Apps/26Apps_for_Sumo/Infrequent_Data_Tier/Install_the_Infrequent_Data_Tier_App_and_view_the_Dashboards)

**Storage Credits**
We can only estimate credits at full retention using recent ingest volume. You can set a retention period with ```average_retention_days``` parameter.

**debug panel for log mappings** Use the log mapping panel at the bottom of the dashboard to verify partition to tier mapping.

panels.title: Detail / Regex Param Debug Report - Ingest Credits Per Partition

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
|min(_messagetime) as f, max(_messagetime) as l , sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice, sourcecategory
| ((l - f)/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| fields _timeslice, dpm, sourcecategory
| transpose row _timeslice column sourcecategory

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
|min(_messagetime) as f, max(_messagetime) as l , sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice,sourcecategory
| ((l - f)/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm
| (dpm)/1000  * 3 * ( duration_in_min / ( 60 * 24))  as cr_metrics
| fields _timeslice, cr_metrics,sourcecategory
| transpose row _timeslice column sourcecategory

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
|min(_messagetime) as f, max(_messagetime) as l , sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| ((l - f)/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm
| (dpm)/1000  * 3 * ( duration_in_min / ( 60 * 24))  as cr_metrics
| sum(cr_metrics) as cr_metrics

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier = "Infrequent" !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * 0.016 as credits_consumed
| timeslice 1d
| sum (credits_consumed) as total_credits_consumed, count as query_count by _timeslice 
| fillmissing timeslice (1d)

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier = "Infrequent" !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * 0.016 as credits_consumed | sum(credits_consumed)

panels.title: Estimated Lifetime Storage Credits for {{average_retention_days}} days retention
panels.text:
This panel shows the GB ingested during the period per tier and the estimate for credits used to store those logs for the entire average_retention_days time.

Actual usage will vary as ingested volumes might fluctuate. 

For new workloads (where full retention is not reached yet) or where usage is increasing/decresing this estimate will be less reliable.

Note: cse_data (defined by cse_regex) are normalised data partitions written back to CIP by CSE. They are free to ingest but DO charge storage credits so are included here.

panels.title: Estimated Period and Lifetime Storage Credit Use For {{average_retention_days}} Days Retention

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes

| min(_messagetime) as f, max(_messagetime) as l,sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view
| where gbytes > 0
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| view as rename_for_report
| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as rename_for_report
| if (view matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",rename_for_report) as rename_for_report

| 0.0067 as cr_storage
|  0.0015 as cr_infreq_storage

| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq_storage * gbytes,cr_storage * gbytes) as storage_credits
| ( (l - f )/ (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) as duration_d
| (storage_credits / duration_d) * {{average_retention_days}} as estimated_lifetime_storage_credits

| max(duration_d) as period_days,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits) as estimated_lifetime_storage_credits by tier
| round(period_days,2) as period_days
| round(gbytes,2) as gbytes_total
| round(gbytes * ( 1/period_days),3) as gbytes_per_day
| round(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits,2) as storage_credits_per_day_full_retention
| round(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits /  {{average_retention_days}},3)  as storage_credits
| fields -gbytes
| fields tier, period_days,gbytes_total,gbytes_per_day,storage_credits,storage_credits_per_day_full_retention

panels.title: Estimated Storage  Credits Per Day With {{average_retention_days}} Days Retention

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi
| bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes

| min(_messagetime) as f, max(_messagetime) as l,sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| view as rename_for_report
| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as rename_for_report
| if (view matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",rename_for_report) as rename_for_report

| 0.0067 as cr_storage
|  0.0015 as cr_infreq_storage

| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq_storage * gbytes,cr_storage * gbytes) as storage_credits
| ( (l - f )/ (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) as duration_d
| (storage_credits / duration_d) * {{average_retention_days}} as estimated_lifetime_storage_credits

| max(duration_d) as period_days,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits) as estimated_lifetime_storage_credits by tier
| round(period_days,2) as period_days
| round(gbytes,2) as gbytes_total
| round(gbytes * ( 1/period_days),3) as gbytes_per_day
| round(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits,2) as estimated_storage_credits_per_day_full_retention
| round(estimated_lifetime_storage_credits /  {{average_retention_days}},3)  as storage_credits
| fields -gbytes
| fields tier, period_days,gbytes_total,gbytes_per_day,storage_credits,estimated_storage_credits_per_day_full_retention

| sum( estimated_storage_credits_per_day_full_retention) as estimated_storage_credits_per_day_full_retention

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| min(_messagetime) as s, max(_messagetime) as e , sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,s,e
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier
| where !(tier = "cse_data")

| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}})  /100),0) as continuous
| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes * ({{cse_pct}}  /100),0) as cse
| if (tier = "frequent", gbytes,0) as frequent
| if (tier = "infrequent",gbytes,0) as infrequent


| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq

| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cont * gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}})  /100),0) as cr_continuous
| if (tier = "continuous",cr_cse * gbytes * ({{cse_pct}}  /100),0) as cr_cse
| if (tier = "frequent",cr_freq * gbytes,0) as cr_frequent
| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq * gbytes,0) as cr_infrequent

| min(s) as s, max(e) as e,sum(cr_continuous) as cr_cont, sum(cr_cse) as cr_cse, sum(cr_frequent) as cr_frequent,sum(cr_infrequent) as cr_infrequent,
sum(continuous) as continuous, sum(cse) as cse,sum(frequent) as frequent, sum(infrequent) as infrequent

| (e - s) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) as days
| continuous / days as continuous
| cse / days as cse
| frequent/ days as frequent
| infrequent / days as infrequent

| cr_cont / days as  cr_cont
| cr_cse / days as cr_cse
| cr_frequent/ days as cr_frequent
| cr_infrequent / days as cr_infrequent
| cr_cont + cr_cse + cr_frequent + cr_infrequent as cr_per_day
| continuous + cse + frequent + infrequent as gb_per_day
| cr_per_day / gb_per_day as CGPI
| fields -s,e

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| min(_messagetime) as s, max(_messagetime) as e , sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,s,e
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by tier

| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| 9 as cr_freq
| 0.4 as cr_infreq
| cr_cont * gbytes * ((100 - {{cse_pct}} ) /100) as cr_cont
| cr_cse * gbytes * ({{cse_pct}} /100)  as cr_cse
| if (tier = "continuous", cr_cont+cr_cse ,0) as credits
| if (tier = "frequent",cr_freq * gbytes,credits) as credits
| if (tier = "infrequent",cr_infreq * gbytes,credits) as credits


| if(tier  = "frequent",gbytes,0) as frequent
| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes,0) as continuous
| if(tier = "infrequent",gbytes,0) as infrequent
| sum(continuous) as continuous,sum(frequent) as frequent, sum(infrequent) as infrequent

| 20 as cr_cont
| 25 as cr_cse
| cr_cont * continuous * ((100 - {{cse_pct}} ) /100) as cr_cont
| cr_cse * continuous * ({{cse_pct}} /100)  as cr_cse

| ( cr_cont + cr_cse  + (frequent * 9) +  (infrequent * .4)  ) / (continuous + frequent + infrequent) as CPGI | avg(CPGI) as CPGI

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| min(_messagetime) as s, max(_messagetime) as e , sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| min(s) as s, max(e) as e ,sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,s,e
| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier
| min(s) as s, max(e) as e ,sum(gbytes) as gbytes by tier
| if(tier  = "frequent",gbytes,0) as frequent
| if (tier = "continuous",gbytes,0) as continuous
| if(tier = "infrequent",gbytes,0) as infrequent
| min(s) as s, max(e) as e ,sum(continuous) as continuous,sum(frequent) as frequent, sum(infrequent) as infrequent
| (e - s) / ( 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) as range_days
| ((( frequent + infrequent) * 20 - ((frequent * 9) + (infrequent * .4))) /range_days) * 365 as annual_ingest_credits_saved | fields annual_ingest_credits_saved

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier = "Infrequent" !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| (sizeInGB * 0.016 ) as credits_consumed    | sum(credits_consumed)
| credits_consumed /7  * 365 as credits_consumed

_sourceCategory=* not _sourcecategory=asoc/* not _sourcecategory=cse/* //AND (AND _messageid=*0 or _messageid=*5)
| _view as index
| if (isempty(_siemforward),"CIP","CSE") as forwarding
| sum(_size) as bytes, count_distinct(index) as partitions, count_distinct(_sourcecategory) as categories by forwarding
| bytes / 1024 /1024 as mb | total mb as tmb | (mb / tmb) * 100  as percent 
| fields forwarding, mb,categories,percent 
| if (forwarding = "CIP",20,25) as %"cr/gb"
| round(percent,1) as percent
| round(mb) as mb

panels.title: Credits Savings (A - B)
panels.text: Subtract B from A to show annual estimated savings from your data tiering.

panels.title: CIP vs CSE Credits Estimate
panels.text: Use the % value for CSE in the cse_pct parameter to estimate cse (25) vs cip (20) ingest credits. If CSE is not used use the value 0.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes 
_sourceCategory=view_volume

| parse regex "\"(?<view>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"sizeInBytes\"\:(?<bytes>\d+),\"count\"\:(?<count>\d+)\}" multi

| if(view matches "_sumologic_report*","saved_views",view) as view
//| if(view matches "*volume*","internal",view) as view
| timeslice by {{timeslice}} 

| sum(bytes) as size_in_bytes by view,_timeslice
| size_in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by view,_timeslice

| "continuous" as tier
| if(view matches /{{freq_regex}}/,"frequent",tier) as tier
| if(view matches /{{infreq_regex}}/,"infrequent",tier) as tier
| if (view matches /(?)CSE_[RS][ei]/,"cse_data",tier) as tier

| where tier = "cse_data"
| view as index
| if (index matches "*sumologic*","sumologic_internal",index) as index
|  sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column index
